About Me

Transitioning Coast Guard Officer with five years of Active Duty service. Full Stack Web Developer and graduate of the U.S. Coast Guard Academy with a BS in Management. I'm passionate about effective teamwork and learning new skills, and fascinated by computer science and as aspects of software development. Ready to break into the tech sector and leverage my technical skills, leadership experience, and enthusiasm to solve challenging problems and add value.
